data.comment: The match is underway. Middlesbrough have kicked-off.
Jonny Howson for Middlesbrough has been booked by Andy Madley and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Preston have kicked-off the second half at Deepdale.
Brad Potts scores to make it 1-0 at Deepdale.
In the minute 64, Marcus Tavernier is replacing Jonny Howson for the away team.
Middlesbrough make their second substitution with Chuba Akpom replacing Duncan Watmore.
The home team replace Andrew Hughes with Josh Earl.
In the minute 74, Alex Neil is making the team's second substitution at Deepdale with Sean Maguire replacing Tom Barkhuizen.
The home team have replaced Alan Browne with Tom Bayliss. This is the third substitution made today by Alex Neil.
Emil Riis Jakobsen is on a sub for Jayden Stockley for Preston.
In the minute 81, Great finish from Scott Sinclair to give Preston a 2-0 lead.
Patrick Roberts is on a sub for George Saville for Middlesbrough.
Goal! Emil Riis Jakobsen extends Preston's lead to 3-0.
